cleaned_text: What we're about We are Fellows of the University of Arizona Integrative Medicine Program. We are forming an alliance in order to bring awareness to the public, to business, and to the government about the power of integrative medicine. Mission: to make healthy eating and a healthy lifestyle the norm and not the exception. Health is about spirit/body/mind and in order to address these things, clinicians need more time with patients. Our health care system needs a structural change and we feel this can be done though disease prevention rather than disease management.
